page.title: 12A Child's View,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Green Street Green has some pleasant shops,and there are not too many to spoil the character of the village.I don't think there is really much entertainment here.To get to the nearest cinema we have to go to Bromley,but I think putting one here would spoil the character of the village.We have Brownies,which I went to when I a bit younger,and there are also Cubs and Guides.The Brownies is good for younger girls.I think Green Street Green is a friendly place to live in.The public transport is good, because there are frequent buses to Orpington and Bromley.There is a station in Chelsfield which is about 10 minutes'walk away from Green Street Green,and there are trains to London.
